sqlReaderQuery.value:
IF	OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#MemberList') IS NOT NULL
	DROP TABLE #MemberList

CREATE TABLE #MemberList	(
							SiteId int,
							MemberId int ,
							ChildMemberId INT,
							PRIMARY KEY(SiteId, ChildMemberId, MemberId)
							)

INSERT INTO #MemberList	(
						SiteId,
						MemberId,
						ChildMemberId
						)
SELECT	dm.SiteId,
		dmc.MemberId,
		dmc.ChildMemberId
FROM	dbo.DimMember dm
			JOIN 
		dbo.DimMemberChild dmc
			ON dm.SiteId = dmc.SiteId
				AND dm.MemberId = dmc.MemberId
WHERE	$partition.pf_DimMember(dm.SiteId) = $partition.pf_DimMember(@{item().SiteId})
		AND dm.IsNonMember = 0
		AND dm.IsDeleted = 0
		AND dm.IsDeceased = 0
		AND dm.IsInternalAccount = 0
GROUP	BY dm.SiteId, 
		dmc.ChildMemberId, 
		dmc.MemberId

IF	OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#DeliveryList') IS NOT NULL
	DROP TABLE #DeliveryList

CREATE TABLE #DeliveryList	(
							SiteId INT,
							EmailId INT,
							EmailRecurrenceId INT,
							MemberId INT,
							ChildMemberId INT,
							DeliverCount INT,
							PRIMARY KEY(SiteId,EmailId,EmailRecurrenceId,ChildMemberId,MemberId)
							)

INSERT	INTO #DeliveryList	(
							SiteId,
							EmailId,
							EmailRecurrenceId,
							MemberId,
							ChildMemberId,
							DeliverCount
							)
SELECT	fea.SiteId,
		fea.EmailId,
		fea.EmailRecurrenceId,
		ml.MemberId,
		ml.ChildMemberId,
		CASE WHEN SUM(fea.DeliverCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DeliverCount
FROM	#MemberList ml
			JOIN 
		dbo.FactEmailAction fea
			ON ml.SiteId = fea.SiteId
				AND ml.ChildMemberId = fea.MemberId
WHERE	$partition.pf_FactEmailAction(fea.SiteId) = $partition.pf_FactEmailAction(@{item().SiteId})
		AND fea.DateKey >= 20170101
		AND fea.DateKey < 20200101
		AND fea.DeliverCount > 0
GROUP	BY fea.SiteId,
		fea.EmailId,
		fea.EmailRecurrenceId,
		ml.MemberId,
		ml.ChildMemberId

IF	OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#OpenClickList') IS NOT NULL
	DROP TABLE #OpenClickList

CREATE TABLE #OpenClickList	(
							SiteId INT,
							EmailId INT,
							EmailRecurrenceId INT,
							MemberId INT,
							OpenCount INT,
							ClickCount INT,
							LastOpenDateKey INT,
							LastClickDateKey INT,
							PRIMARY KEY(SiteId,EmailId,EmailRecurrenceId,MemberId)
							)

INSERT	INTO #OpenClickList	(
							SiteId,
							EmailId,
							EmailRecurrenceId,
							MemberId,
							OpenCount,
							ClickCount,
							LastOpenDateKey,
							LastClickDateKey
							)
SELECT	fea.SiteId,
		fea.EmailId,
		fea.EmailRecurrenceId,
		dl.MemberId,
		CASE WHEN SUM(fea.OpenCount) > 0 OR SUM(fea.ClickCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS OpenCount,
		CASE WHEN SUM(fea.ClickCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ClickCount,
		CASE 
			WHEN 	MAX(CASE WHEN fea.OpenCount > 0 THEN DateKey ELSE 19000101 END) >= MAX(CASE WHEN fea.ClickCount > 0 THEN DateKey ELSE 19000101 END) 
			THEN 	MAX(CASE WHEN fea.OpenCount > 0 THEN DateKey ELSE NULL END)
			ELSE 	MAX(CASE WHEN fea.ClickCount > 0 THEN DateKey ELSE NULL END) 
		END AS LastOpenDateKey,
		MAX(CASE WHEN fea.ClickCount > 0 THEN DateKey ELSE NULL END) AS LastClickDateKey
FROM	#DeliveryList dl
			JOIN 
		dbo.FactEmailAction fea
			ON dl.SiteId = fea.SiteId
				AND dl.EmailId = fea.EmailId
				AND dl.EmailRecurrenceId = fea.EmailRecurrenceId
				AND dl.ChildMemberId = fea.MemberId
WHERE	$partition.pf_FactEmailAction(fea.SiteId) = $partition.pf_FactEmailAction(@{item().SiteId})
		AND fea.DateKey >= 20170101
		AND (
			fea.OpenCount > 0
			OR fea.ClickCount > 0
			)
GROUP	BY fea.SiteId,
		fea.EmailId,
		fea.EmailRecurrenceId,
		dl.MemberId

SELECT	dl.SiteId,
		dl.MemberId,
		SUM(dl.DeliverCount) AS DeliverCount,
		ISNULL(SUM(ocl.OpenCount),0) AS OpenCount,
		ISNULL(SUM(ocl.ClickCount),0) AS ClickCount,
		MAX(ocl.LastOpenDateKey) AS LastOpenDateKey,
		MAX(ocl.LastClickDateKey) AS LastClickDateKey
FROM	#DeliveryList dl
			LEFT JOIN
		#OpenClickList ocl
			ON dl.SiteId = ocl.SiteId
				AND dl.EmailId = ocl.Emailid
				AND dl.EmailRecurrenceid = ocl.EmailRecurrenceId
				AND dl.MemberId = ocl.MemberId
GROUP	BY dl.SiteId,
		dl.MemberId
